function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Curtailment of field-based empirical research in regions with severe energy challenges and potential epidemic impact","Impact":"Exacerbation of biases in representation in volume, methodology, and regional coverage","Mitigation":"Prioritize field-based empirical research in pandemic-impacted areas, balance desk study with ethnographic research, and emphasize evidence-based research","Technologies":"Remote sensing technologies, data analytics for remote research","People":"Researchers, energy scholars, and communities in pandemic-impacted areas","Owner":"Research institutions, funding organizations"}]}
